name: casual_leave
description: For personal or urgent matters. Usually short-duration.

name: sick_leave
description: For health-related issues or medical conditions. Doctor certificate may be required if leave exceeds 2-3 days.

name: privilege_leave
description: For vacation or long leaves. Accumulated monthly or yearly.

name: leave_without_pay
description: Unpaid leave when no balance is left in other types.

name: maternity_leave
description: For female employees during childbirth. Typically up to 26 weeks as per Indian law.

name: paternity_leave
description: For male employees during child birth. Typically 7–15 days.

name: marriage_leave
description: Granted for employee's marriage. Often a one-time leave of 3–5 days.

name: bereavement_leave
description: Leave due to death of an immediate family member.

name: comp_off
description: Leave in exchange for working on weekends or public holidays. Attendance proof may be required.

name: half_day_leave
description: For partial-day absence. Usually availed as part of CL or SL.

name: sabbatical_leave
description: Long-term leave for higher studies, research, or personal reasons. Subject to management approval.

name: study_leave
description: Leave for employees pursuing higher education, often granted conditionally.

name: festival_leave
description: Optional leave for specific regional or religious festivals.

name: adoption_leave
description: Leave for adopting parents, similar to maternity or paternity leave in duration and policy.
